trans-unit.source: Stores the fields and properties read by a condition or written to by an action.
The information stored by RuleAnalysis is important because it identifies dependencies and side effects of rules in the rule set.
These dependencies and side effects drive the chaining behavior.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.

A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value that indicates whether analysis is being done for writes (in the case of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> objects) or reads (in the case of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> objects).
Adds the fields and properties used by an expression as symbols to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref> instance.
Use the AddSymbol method to add fields and properties used by an expression to the list of symbols for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis> instance.
A string that represents the path to a field or property.
Gets a value that indicates whether analysis is being done for writes or reads.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if analysis is being done for writes (in the case of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> objects); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the analysis is being done for reads (in the case of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> objects).
Returns the list of symbols from the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref> instance.
The list of symbols for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref> instance.
